short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MemoData Ebay scraper can easy extrac product data, including product, price, sales ranking, and reviews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you want some other data,  please feel free to request it in support.

1. Open the Ebay website
2. search for a certain product
3. on the product list page, use the extension to extrac all product information
